# [PA181 - Services - Systems, Modeling and Execution](https://is.muni.cz/predmet/fi/jaro2019/PA181)

[![Build Status](https://img.shields.io/travis/europ/MUNI-FI-PA181/master.svg?logo=travis)](https://travis-ci.org/europ/MUNI-FI-PA181)
[![release](https://img.shields.io/github/release/europ/MUNI-FI-PA181.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;utf8;base64,)](https://github.com/europ/MUNI-FI-PA181/releases/latest)
[![license](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-green.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;utf8;base64,)](https://github.com/europ/MUNI-FI-PA181/blob/master/LICENSE)

## About

Term project for course [PA181 Services - Systems, Modeling and Execution](https://is.muni.cz/predmet/fi/jaro2019/PA181) in year 2019. Within the project, we had to create a fully functional application using the [IBM Cloud](https://cloud.ibm.com/) technology including a detailed documentation and a presentation. The application offers a user-self testing platform, where you can run one of available tests or upload your custom test suite.
